reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 641/21: ADDITIONAL OBJECTS FOR LOCAL HEALTH SYSTEM INTEGRATION NETWORKS
reg_info.reg_name_text: ADDITIONAL OBJECTS FOR LOCAL HEALTH SYSTEM INTEGRATION NETWORKS

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “CHEO” means the Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario – Ottawa Children’s Treatment Centre.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“CHEO” means the Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario – Ottawa Children’s Treatment Centre.

content.section: Additional object of Champlain Local Health Integration Network
content.content: 2. The following is prescribed as an additional object of the Champlain Local Health Integration Network: 1. Providing administrative and business support services to CHEO to facilitate CHEO’s management of contracts with service providers who provide home and community care services described in Ontario Regulation 187/22 (Home and Community Care Services) made under the Connecting Care Act, 2019. O. Reg. 641/21, s. 2; O. Reg. 201/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. The following is prescribed as an additional object of the Champlain Local Health Integration Network:

1. Providing administrative and business support services to CHEO to facilitate CHEO’s management of contracts with service providers who provide home and community care services described in Ontario Regulation 187/22 (Home and Community Care Services) made under the Connecting Care Act, 2019. O. Reg. 641/21, s. 2; O. Reg. 201/22, s. 1.

content.section: Additional object of Champlain Local Health Integration Network
content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Additional object of Champlain Local Health Integration Network
